snippet: When it comes to the case of the retaliatory lane closings at the George Washington Bridge, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo and his aides keep repeating: It’s a New Jersey issue.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo, not one to shy away from a political fight, has said little about the scandal engulfing New Jersey Gov Chris Christie and retaliatory lane closings at the George Washington Bridge; he and his aides have only said this was and remains a New Jersey issue.

byline.original: By THOMAS KAPLAN and SUSANNE CRAIG

lead_paragraph: When it comes to the case of the retaliatory lane closings at the George Washington Bridge, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo and his aides keep repeating: It’s a New Jersey issue.

headline.main: Cuomo Saying Little on Bridge Scandal
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Saying Little on Bridge Scandal
